script.name: Menu.GNS.Open.Clipboard.SM
script.description: Menu: GNS Show Clipboard Articles - Set Menu

line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Set Menu for the Article Clipboard submenu
* set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
* If a clipped article has been selected, display it
* If a selected article has been flagged for removal from the clipboard
* If article has been loaded for display
* List all articles saved to clipboard
* If article is being displayed, include menu option to remove it

sval.val: Menu: GNS Show Clipboard Articles - Set Menu
DESCRIPTION: Set Menu for the Article Clipboard submenu
set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
If a clipped article has been selected, display it
If a selected article has been flagged for removal from the clipboard
If article has been loaded for display
List all articles saved to clipboard
If article is being displayed, include menu option to remove it
